name: Yield Yak
description: Yield Yak builds DeFi tools for Avalanche users. Swap on Yak Swap to get the best price, or deposit into yield strategies to auto-compound and maximize returns.

missions.name: YIELD_YAK
missions.description: Use Yak Swap and make a deposit

quests.name: Yak Swap
quests.description: Make at least one swap with Yak Swap on Avalanche

tasks.name: Perform Swap
tasks.description: Complete a token swap on Yak Swap
tasks.method_id: The hashed event signature of the function that carries the action for the task

quests.name: Yak Depositor
quests.description: Deposit into Yield Yak's BTC.b DeltaPrime vault

tasks.name: Make a deposit
tasks.description: Deposit into Yield Yak's BTC.b DeltaPrime vault
tasks.method_id: The hashed event signature of the function that carries the action for the task

badge.name: Yakhead
badge.description: Awarded for making a swap on Yak Swap or making a deposit
